New Records: Yuki Kawamura made his first NBA bucket with a step-back three-pointer in the Memphis Grizzlies' 128-104 win against the Washington Wizards on November 9, 2024.
Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura's three-pointer with 1:55 left in the fourth quarter gave the Grizzlies a 125-100 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A video of Kawamura's first NBA bucket went viral after being posted on the NBA's official X account.
